name: quickbooks-mcp
description: Multi-tenant QuickBooks Online integration via Token Broker

brokerUrl.title: Token Broker URL
brokerUrl.description: The URL of your QuickBooks Token Broker service.

brokerToken.title: Broker API Token
brokerToken.description: Your secret API token for the broker service.

defaultCompany.title: Default Company Name (Optional)
defaultCompany.description: The default QuickBooks company to use if none is specified in a query.

debug.title: Enable Debug Logging
debug.description: Outputs detailed logs to the Claude Desktop developer console.

cacheDir.title: Cache Directory (Optional)
cacheDir.description: Directory for caching QuickBooks data. Leave empty to use in-memory cache only.

logFilePath.title: Log File Path (Optional)
logFilePath.description: Path for the extension's log file for debugging.

tools.name: health_check
tools.description: Check if the server and broker connection are healthy.

tools.name: qb_list_vendors
tools.description: List QuickBooks vendors for a company.

tools.name: qb_list_items
tools.description: List QuickBooks items (products/services) for a company.

tools.name: qb_list_accounts
tools.description: List QuickBooks chart of accounts for a company.
